atk-s0501a4:2_0: Idāni ekaṁ nāma kinti evamādīnaṁ kumārapañhānaṁ atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
atk-s0501a4:2_1: Tesaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ idha nikkhepappayojanañca vatvā vaṇṇanaṁ karissāma –
atk-s0501a4:3_0: Aṭṭhuppatti tāva nesaṁ sopāko nāma bhagavato mahāsāvako ahosi.
atk-s0501a4:3_2: tassa bhagavā pañhabyākaraṇena upasampadaṁ anuññātukāmo attanā adhippetatthānaṁ pañhānaṁ byākaraṇasamatthataṁ passanto ‘‘ekaṁ nāma ki’’nti evamādinā pañhe pucchi. So byākāsi.
atk-s0501a4:3_3: Tena ca byākaraṇena bhagavato cittaṁ ārādhesi.
atk-s0501a4:6_0: Yasmā pana saraṇagamanehi buddhadhammasaṅghānussativasena cittabhāvanā, sikkhāpadehi sīlabhāvanā,
atk-s0501a4:6_2: tasmā idāni nānappakārato paññābhāvanāmukhadassanatthaṁ ime pañhabyākaraṇā idha nikkhittā.
atk-s0501a4:6_3: Yasmā vā sīlapadaṭṭhāno samādhi, samādhipadaṭṭhānā ca paññā;
atk-s0501a4:6_6: tasmā sikkhāpadehi sīlaṁ dvattiṁsākārena taṁgocaraṁ samādhiñca dassetvā samāhitacittassa nānādhammaparikkhārāya paññāya pabhedadassanatthaṁ idha nikkhittātipi viññātabbā.
atk-s0501a4:10_0: Idāni tesaṁ atthavaṇṇanā hoti – ekaṁ nāma kinti bhagavā yasmiṁ ekadhammasmiṁ bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:10_3: ‘‘Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti thero puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti. ‘‘Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāsati? Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:10_5: 5.8) evamādīni cettha suttāni evaṁ vissajjanayuttisambhave sādhakāni.
atk-s0501a4:10_7: so āhāro taṁ vā nesaṁ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ ‘‘ekaṁ nāma ki’’nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:10_9: na tu sāsane loke vā aññaṁ ekaṁ nāma natthīti ñāpetuṁ vuttaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a4:11_1: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamasmiṁ ekadhamme? Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. Imasmiṁ kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:11_2: ekadhamme bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:11_3: ‘Eko pañho eko uddeso ekaṁ veyyākaraṇa’nti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:12_2: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0501a4:12_4: evaṁ paccayaṁ āhārasaddena gahetvā paccayaṭṭhitikā ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti vuttā.
atk-s0501a4:12_5: Cattāro pana āhāre sandhāya – ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti vuccamāne ‘‘asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārā aphassakā avedanakā’’ti vacanato (vibha.
atk-s0501a4:13_0: Tattha siyā – evampi vuccamāne ‘‘katame dhammā sapaccayā?
atk-s0501a4:13_4: Na kho panetaṁ evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kasmā ?
atk-s0501a4:13_7: Khandhe upādāya paññāpetabbato. Kathaṁ? Gehe gāmopacāro viya.
atk-s0501a4:13_8: Seyyathāpi hi gehāni upādāya paññāpetabbattā gāmassa ekasmimpi dvīsu tīsupi vā gehesu daḍḍhesu ‘‘gāmo daḍḍho’’ti evaṁ gehe gāmopacāro siddho,
atk-s0501a4:13_9: evameva khandhesu paccayaṭṭhena āhāraṭṭhitikesu ‘‘sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti ayaṁ upacāro siddhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:13_10: Paramatthato ca khandhesu jāyamānesu jīyamānesu mīyamānesu ca ‘‘khaṇe khaṇe tvaṁ bhikkhu jāyase ca jīyase ca mīyase cā’’ti vadatā bhagavatā tesu sattesu khandhopacāro siddhoti dassito evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:13_11: Yato yena paccayākhyena āhārena sabbe sattā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0501a4:13_12: so āhāro taṁ vā nesaṁ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ ekanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:13_13: Āhāro hi āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ vā aniccatākāraṇato nibbidāṭṭhānaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a4:13_14: Atha tesu sabbasattasaññitesu saṅkhāresu aniccatādassanena nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṁ pāpuṇāti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:15_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā’’ti. (dha. pa. 277);
atk-s0501a4:16_0: Ettha ca ‘‘ekaṁ nāma ki’’nti ca ‘‘kihā’’ti ca duvidho pāṭho,
atk-s0501a4:16_4: theriyānampi ayameva pāṭho’’ti ubhayathāpi pana ekova attho. Yathā ruccati, tathā paṭhitabbaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:16_5: Yathā pana ‘‘sukhena phuṭṭho atha vā dukhena (dha. pa. 83),
atk-s0501a4:16_6: dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedetī’’ti evamādīsu katthaci dukhanti ca katthaci dukkhanti ca vuccati, evaṁ katthaci ekanti, katthaci ekkanti vuccati.
atk-s0501a4:16_7: Idha pana ekaṁ nāmāti ayameva pāṭho.
atk-s0501a4:18_0: Evaṁ iminā pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati dve nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:18_1: Thero dveti paccanubhāsitvā ‘‘nāmañca rūpañcā’’ti dhammādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:18_3: cittassa ca natihetuto sabbampi arūpaṁ ‘‘nāma’’nti vuccati.
atk-s0501a4:18_4: Idha pana nibbidāhetuttā sāsavadhammameva adhippetaṁ ruppanaṭṭhena cattāro ca mahābhūtā,
atk-s0501a4:18_5: sabbañca tadupādāya pavattamānaṁ rūpaṁ ‘‘rūpa’’nti vuccati, taṁ sabbampi idhādhippetaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:18_6: Adhippāyavaseneva cettha ‘‘dve nāma nāmañca rūpañcā’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ dvinnamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:19_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu dvīsu? Nāme ca rūpe ca. Imesu kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:19_2: dvīsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Dve pañhā, dve uddesā,
atk-s0501a4:19_3: dve veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:20_0: Ettha ca nāmarūpamattadassanena attadiṭṭhiṁ pahāya anattānupassanāmukheneva nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:22_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā’’ti. (dha. pa. 279);
atk-s0501a4:24_0: Idāni imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati tīṇi nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:24_1: Thero tīṇīti paccanubhāsitvā puna byākaritabbassa atthassa liṅgānurūpaṁ saṅkhyaṁ dassento ‘‘tisso vedanā’’ti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:24_3: imāsamatthamahaṁ tīṇīti paccemī’’ti dassento āhāti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:24_6: Purimanayeneva cettha ‘‘tisso vedanā’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ tiṇṇamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:25_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu tīsu? Tīsu vedanāsu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:25_2: tīsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Tayo pañhā, tayo uddesā,
atk-s0501a4:25_3: tīṇi veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ ,
atk-s0501a4:26_1: sabbaṁ taṁ dukkhasminti vadāmī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 4.259) vuttasuttānusārena vā. –
atk-s0501a4:29_0: Evaṁ dukkhadukkhatāvipariṇāmadukkhatāsaṅkhāradukkhatānusārena vā tissannaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhabhāvadassanena sukhasaññaṁ pahāya dukkhānupassanāmukhena nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:31_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā’’ti. (dha. pa. 278);
atk-s0501a4:33_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati cattāri nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:33_1: Tattha imassa pañhassa byākaraṇapakkhe katthaci purimanayeneva cattāro āhārā adhippetā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:34_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu catūsu? Catūsu āhāresu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:34_2: catūsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:34_3: ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:35_0: Katthaci yesu subhāvitacitto anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, tāni cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni. Yathāha kajaṅgalā bhikkhunī –
atk-s0501a4:36_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu catūsu? Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu. Imesu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0501a4:36_2: catūsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:36_3: ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a4:37_0: Idha pana yesaṁ catunnaṁ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti,
atk-s0501a4:37_2: Yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṁ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a4:39_0: Yasmā vā sadevakena lokena araṇīyato abhigamanīyatoti vuttaṁ hoti,
atk-s0501a4:39_1: vāyamitabbaṭṭhānasaññite aye vā iriyanato, anaye vā na iriyanato,
atk-s0501a4:40_0: ‘‘Cattārimāni , bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni, ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti,
atk-s0501a4:41_0: Apica ariyassa bhagavato saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:43_0: Atha vā etesaṁ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:44_1: catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddhoti vuccatī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.1093).
atk-s0501a4:45_1: Etesaṁ pana ariyasaccānaṁ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:46_1: dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ anubuddhaṁ paṭividdhaṁ…pe… dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ anubuddhaṁ paṭividdhaṁ, ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, khīṇā bhavanetti,
atk-s0501a4:48_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati pañca nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:48_3: Upādānajanitā upādānajanakā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā. Yaṁkiñci rūpaṁ, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇañca sāsavā upādāniyā, etesametaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:48_4: Pubbanayeneva cettha ‘‘pañcupādānakkhandhā’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ pañcannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:49_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu pañcasu? Pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:49_2: pañcasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Pañca pañhā, pañca uddesā ,
atk-s0501a4:49_3: pañca veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:50_0: Ettha ca pañcakkhandhe udayabbayavasena sammasanto vipassanāmataṁ laddhā anupubbena nibbānāmataṁ sacchikaroti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:52_0: Labhatī pītipāmojjaṁ, amataṁ taṁ vijānata’’nti. (dha. pa. 374);
atk-s0501a4:54_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati ‘‘cha nāma ki’’nti?
atk-s0501a4:54_3: attānaṁ vā adhikatvā pavattāni ajjhattikāni. Āyatanato, āyassa vā tananato,
atk-s0501a4:54_6: Pubbanayena cettha ‘‘cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānī’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ channamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:55_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu chasu? Chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:55_2: chasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:55_3: ‘Cha pañhā cha uddesā cha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:56_0: Ettha ca cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, ‘‘suñño gāmoti kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:56_2: 4.238) vacanato suññato pubbuḷakamarīcikādīni viya aciraṭṭhitikato tucchato vañcanato ca samanupassaṁ nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantaṁ katvā maccurājassa adassanaṁ upeti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:58_0: Evaṁ lokaṁ avekkhantaṁ, maccurājā na passatī’’ti. (dha. pa. 170);
atk-s0501a4:60_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati satta nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:60_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo vuttā,
atk-s0501a4:60_2: apica kho pana yesu dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:60_4: Ayampi cattho bhagavatā anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:61_2: mañcepi tumhe gahapatayo upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha,
atk-s0501a4:61_4: yathā taṁ kajaṅgalikāya bhikkhuniyā byākata’’nti (a. ni. 10.28).
atk-s0501a4:63_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu sattasu? Sattasu bojjhaṅgesu. Imesu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0501a4:63_2: sattasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:63_3: ‘Satta pañhā satta uddesā satta veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a4:65_2: Tatrāyaṁ padattho – etāya lokiyalokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādi- anekupaddavappaṭipakkhabhūtāya satidhammavicayavīriyapītippassaddhisamādhupekkhāsaṅkhātāya dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhi,
atk-s0501a4:65_6: Yathāha – ‘‘satta bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’’ti.
atk-s0501a4:65_7: Yathāvuttappakārāya vā etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvakopi bodhi.
atk-s0501a4:65_8: Iti tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgabhūtattā bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni viya,
atk-s0501a4:65_9: tassa vā bodhīti laddhavohārassa ariyasāvakassa aṅgabhūtattāpi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0501a4:66_1: Bodhāya saṁvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā,
atk-s0501a4:66_3: 2.17) imināpi paṭisambhidāyaṁ vuttena vidhinā bojjhaṅgānaṁ bojjhaṅgaṭṭho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:66_4: Evamime satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento bahulīkaronto na cirasseva ekantanibbidādiguṇapaṭilābhī hoti,
atk-s0501a4:66_5: tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati . Vuttañcetaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a4:67_1: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattantī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.201).
atk-s0501a4:69_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati aṭṭha nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:69_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe aṭṭha lokadhammā vuttā,
atk-s0501a4:69_2: apica kho pana yesu dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:69_3: te dassento ‘‘ariyāni aṭṭha maggaṅgānī’’ti avatvā yasmā aṭṭhaṅgavinimutto maggo nāma natthi, aṭṭhaṅgamattameva tu maggo,
atk-s0501a4:69_4: tasmā tamatthaṁ sādhento desanāvilāsena ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:69_5: Bhagavatāpi cāyamattho desanānayo ca anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:70_0: ‘‘Paṇḍitā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī…pe… ahampi evameva byākareyyaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:70_1: yathā taṁ kajaṅgalikāya bhikkhuniyā byākata’’nti (a. ni. 10.28).
atk-s0501a4:72_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Aṭṭha pañhā, aṭṭha uddesā,
atk-s0501a4:72_2: aṭṭha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a4:73_0: Evamayaṁ attho ca desanānayo ca bhagavatā anumato evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:74_5: pañcaṅgikaṁ viya ca tūriyaṁ aṅgavinibbhogena anupalabbhasabhāvato aṅgamattamevāti veditabbo. Maggati iminā nibbānaṁ, sayaṁ vā maggati,
atk-s0501a4:75_0: Evamaṭṭhappabhedañcimaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento bhikkhu avijjaṁ bhindati, vijjaṁ uppādeti, nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0501a4:75_1: tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0501a4:76_1: sālisūkaṁ vā yavasūkaṁ vā sammā paṇihitaṁ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṁ hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā bhecchati,
atk-s0501a4:76_2: lohitaṁ vā uppādessatīti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati. Taṁ kissa hetu? Sammā paṇihitattā, bhikkhave, sūkassa, evameva kho, bhikkhave ,
atk-s0501a4:76_3: so vata bhikkhu sammā paṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammā paṇihitāya maggabhāvanāya avijjaṁ bhecchati, vijjaṁ uppādessati,
atk-s0501a4:78_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati nava nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:78_3: Sattāti jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhe khandhe upādāya paññattā pāṇino paṇṇatti vā.
atk-s0501a4:78_4: Āvāsāti āvasanti etesūti āvāsā, sattānaṁ āvāsā sattāvāsā. Esa desanāmaggo,
atk-s0501a4:78_5: atthato pana navavidhānaṁ sattānametaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:79_2: seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā, ayaṁ paṭhamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_3: sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā brahmakāyikā, paṭhamābhinibbattā, ayaṁ dutiyo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_4: sattā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā ābhassarā, ayaṁ tatiyo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_5: sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā subhakiṇhā, ayaṁ catuttho sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_6: sattā asaññino appaṭisaṁvedino, seyyathāpi, devā asaññasattā, ayaṁ pañcamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_7: sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ…pe… ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā , ayaṁ chaṭṭho sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_8: sattā…pe… viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā, ayaṁ sattamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_9: sattā…pe… ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā, ayaṁ aṭṭhamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:80_0: Purimanayeneva cettha ‘‘nava sattāvāsā’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ navannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:81_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu navasu? Navasu sattāvāsesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:81_2: navasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Nava pañhā , nava uddesā,
atk-s0501a4:81_3: nava veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:82_0: Ettha ca ‘‘nava dhammā pariññeyyā. Katame nava? Nava sattāvāsā’’ti (dī. ni.
atk-s0501a4:82_1: 3.359) vacanato navasu sattāvāsesu ñātapariññāya dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvadassanaṁ pahāya suddhasaṅkhārapuñjamattadassanena nibbindamāno tīraṇapariññāya aniccānupassanena virajjamāno dukkhānupassanena vimuccamāno anattānupassanena sammā pariyantadassāvī pahānapariññāya sammattamabhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Tenetaṁ vuttaṁ –
atk-s0501a4:83_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu navasu? Navasu sattāvāsesū’’ti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:85_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati dasa nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:85_1: Tattha kiñcāpi imassa pañhassa ito aññatra veyyākaraṇesu dasa akusalakammapathā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:86_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu dasasu? Dasasu akusalakammapathesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:86_2: dasasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe. … dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:86_3: ‘Dasa pañhā dasa uddesā dasa veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:87_0: Idha pana yasmā ayamāyasmā attānaṁ anupanetvā aññaṁ byākātukāmo,
atk-s0501a4:87_1: yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṁ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a4:87_2: tasmā yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a4:87_3: tesaṁ adhigamaṁ dīpento dasahaṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:87_4: Yato ettha yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a4:87_5: tāni dasaṅgāni ‘‘dasa nāma ki’’nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni. Tāni ca dasa –
atk-s0501a4:88_0: ‘‘Asekho asekhoti, bhante, vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu asekho hotīti? Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:88_10: asekhāya sammāvimuttiyā samannāgato hoti. Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekho hotī’’ti (a. ni. 10.111). –
